summary.para: A set of callback routines to where the provider stores its implementation of the callback.

remarks.para: The provider must supply implementations for StartDirectoryEnumerationCallback, EndDirectoryEnumerationCallback, GetDirectoryEnumerationCallback, GetPlaceholderInformationCallback, and GetFileDataCallback.
The QueryFileNameCallback, NotifyOperationCallback, and CancelCommandCallback callbacks are optional.

item.description: If the provider does not supply an implementation of QueryFileNameCallback, ProjFS will invoke the directory enumeration callbacks to determine the existence of a file path in the provider's store.
If the provider does not supply an implementation of NotifyOperationCallback, it will not get any notifications from ProjFS.
If the provider does not supply an implementation of CancelCommandCallback, none of the other callbacks will be cancellable. The provider will process all callbacks synchronously.
